briefTitle: A Phase3 Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of MEDI3250 in Healthy Japanese Children Age 7 Years Through 18 Years
conditions: Healthy Japanese Children Age 7 Years Through 18 Years

outcomeMeasures.title: the Incidence of Laboratory-confirmed Influenza Infection (Matched Strain)
outcomeMeasures.description: The vaccine efficacy of MEDI3250 compared to placebo against the incidence of laboratory-confirmed influenza infection (matched strain)

outcomeMeasures.title: the Incidence of Laboratory-confirmed Influenza Infection (Any Strain)
outcomeMeasures.description: The vaccine efficacy of MEDI3250 compared to placebo against the incidence of laboratory-confirmed influenza infection (any strain)

outcomeMeasures.title: the Incidence of Laboratory-confirmed Influenza Infection (Matched Strain, by Strain)
outcomeMeasures.description: The vaccine efficacy of MEDI3250 compared to placebo against the incidence of laboratory-confirmed influenza infection (matched strain, by strain)
